body_html:
Hi, @achalshah20 ,
Thank you very much!
So the tf.Variable is designed just for creating new variables, which brings benefits to writing the libraries. Then we users can recreate as much layers as we can, just using one line of code like this:

net = fully_connected(input_tensor, shape)

Ok, thank you again~
GeWei

body:
Hi, @achalshah20 ,
Thank you very much!
So the tf.Variable is designed just for creating new variables, which brings benefits to writing the libraries. Then we users can recreate as much layers as we can, just using one line of code like this:
```
net = fully_connected(input_tensor, shape)
```
Ok, thank you again~
GeWei
